arts.ttl: One change from historic win last weekend: Predicted Everton lineup vs. Wolves

arts.ttl: Wolves vs. Everton: Head-to-head record and past meetings

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville go back and forth about Wolves' chances against Everton
arts.sum: Wolves face Everton in the Premier League this weekend, hoping to build on the success of their Carabao Cup win. Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville change their Wolves vs Everton prediction

New signing Jhon Arias created the most chances at the FIFA Club World Cup this summer, and there is no doubt that Strand Larsen will be given plenty of opportunities in and around the box from his Colombian teammate. Strand Larsen came on as a substitute against the Hammers, and scored two goals in two minutes, proving why Wolves are adamant to keep him.
